129,000 ACC claims, 900 deaths: Analysis reveals alcohol’s big health burden https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/129000-acc-claims-900-deaths-analysis-reveals-boozes-big-health-burden/A4PF77IR6BHDNNVPQVP72QH3LQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/129000-acc-claims-900-deaths-analysis-reveals-boozes-big-health-burden/A4PF77IR6BHDNNVPQVP72QH3LQ/ Jamie MortonA major new analysis has laid bare the health burden that booze is causing in New Zealand.
